docs.text:
Hacman - Electric Foundry For Metal Casting


Overview


This is a series of Docs for the use and construction of a Foundary based on the following links




https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cte_LSYflAE


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6fvBzlrlKl0




This foundary is not induction based, but uses a electric heated coil instead for cheapness.
It should be cabable of smelting / creating aluminum stock for the cnc / lathe


Warning


Smelting metal can be very dangerous please take all precautions required
docs.title: Home
Hacman - Electric Foundry For Metal Casting

docs.text:
This is a series of Docs for the use and construction of a Foundary based on the following links   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cte_LSYflAE  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6fvBzlrlKl0   This foundary is not induction based, but uses a electric heated coil instead for cheapness.
It should be cabable of smelting / creating aluminum stock for the cnc / lathe
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Smelting metal can be very dangerous please take all precautions required
docs.title: Warning

docs.text:
Safety Gear


Overview


So far we
ve identifed the following for cheap / safety gear for use with the forge




Mask
 

    Climax - Black Head Welding Shield With Fixed Glass Filter Plate - Conforms to EN 169 and EN 175




 




Boots
 

    SB - HRO - Tough Grained Foundry Boot FS1 - Conforms to BS4676 - Pair - FS-FS1




 




Apron
 

    Portwest - Tan Leather Welding Apron - Conforms to EN11611 Class 2 - [PW-SW10TAR]




 




Lower Leg Protection
 

    Rhino Weld - Long Split Leather Welding Gaiters with Velcro Strap - Conforms to EN11611 - [FU-AC211]




 




Sleeve Protection
 

    Elasticated Chrome Leather Sleeves - Pair - [UC-ALLCHR-SLEEVE]




 




Gloves
 

    Standard Leather Gauntlet - Red - Conforms to EN388 (4133) 
 EN407 (413X4X) - Pair - [SM-20923]




 




Welding Curtain
 

    Green Canvas Welding Curtain With Eyelets - Size 8 x 6 Foot - Conforms to bs5867-2:2008 Type B - [MH-1085LGE]
docs.title: Safety Gear
